description:
What's inside:
•    1000+ puzzles (nonograms) to solve 
•    Solo, co-op and versus modes (1-4 players)
•    Tutorial for newbies
•    Wide range of puzzle sizes – from 5x5 to 15x20
•    Power-Ups to save you trouble

Follow the numbers at top rows and leftmost columns to discover hidden pixel art!
name: Logic Pic
